00046 bool ins_attr_computed(const Expr_instance *ins, const vector<Expr_instance> &vec)
00047 {
00048     for(size_t i(0); i < vec.size(); i++)
00049     {
00050         if(vec[i].equals(ins))
00051         {
00052             return true;
00053         }
00054     }
00055     return false;
00056 }
00057 
00061 void get_inherits_of(const Symbol *symb, const vector<Expr_instance> &computed, vector<Expr_instance> &rec_child)
00062 {
00063         /* For all computed's vector. */
00064         for(size_t i(0); i < computed.size(); i++)
00065     {
00066         if (computed[i].get_symb()->equals(*symb) && computed[i].get_attr()->is_inherit())
00067         {
00068                 /* Push in the rec_child vector */
00069             rec_child.push_back(computed[i]);
00070             rec_child.back().set_num(0);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }

00078 bool belong_it(const map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator it, const vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator > &vec)
00079 {
00080         for(size_t i(0); i < vec.size(); i++)
00081         {
00082                 if(it == vec[i])
00083                 {
00084                         return true;
00085                 }
00086         }
00087         return false;
00088 }

00093 void merge_vec(const vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> &vec_source, vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> &vec_targed)
00094 {
00095         if(vec_targed.size() == 0)
00096         {
00097                 /* Non necesary merge */
00098                 vec_targed = vec_source;
00099         }
00100         else
00101         {
00102                 /* Merge necesary */
00103                 for(size_t i(0); i < vec_source.size(); i++)
00104                 {
00105                         if(!belong_it(vec_source[i],vec_targed))
00106                         {
00107                                 vec_targed.push_back(vec_source[i]);
00108                         }
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 }
00112 
00116 void merge_vec_without_plan
00117 (
00118         const vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> &vec_source,
00119         vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> &vec_targed,
00120         const map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator &plan
00121 )
00122 {
00123         if(vec_targed.size() == 0)
00124         {
00125                 /* Non necesary merge */
00126                 vec_targed = vec_source;
00127         }
00128         else
00129         {
00130                 /* Merge necesary */
00131                 for(size_t i(0); i < vec_source.size(); i++)
00132                 {
00133                         if(!belong_it(vec_source[i], vec_targed) && vec_source[i] != plan)
00134                         {
00135                                 vec_targed.push_back(vec_source[i]);
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138         }
00139 }

00144 void plan_family_computed(const vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> &plans_computed, vector<unsigned short> &visit_seq_computed)
00145 {
00146         for (size_t i(0); i < plans_computed.size(); i++)
00147         {
00148                 unsigned short index_family(plans_computed[i]->second);
00149                 if (!belong_index(index_family, visit_seq_computed))
00150                 {
00151                         visit_seq_computed.push_back(index_family);
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 }

00161 bool Builder_visit_sequences::gen_visit_seq
00162 (
00163         const map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator &it_plan,
00164         vector<Expr_instance> &ins_computed,
00165         vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator > &plans_computed,
00166         const vector<unsigned short> &v_seq_computed
00167 )
00168 {
00169         const Order_eval_eq &plan(b_plans.get_plans_uniques()[it_plan->second]);
00170 
00171     bool leaves(false);
00172     Visit_seq sequence;
00173     vector<Expr_instance> ins_computed_own;
00174 
00175     const Rule &rule(attr_grammar.get_rule(b_plans.get_context_unique(it_plan->first.id_plan)[0]));
00176 
00177     size_t i(0);
00178     for(; i < plan.size(); i++)
00179     {
00180         const Equation *eq(rule.get_eq(plan[i]));
00181 
00182         const vector<const Expr_instance*> &instances_right_side(eq->get_instance_right_side());
00183 
00184         for(size_t j(0); j < instances_right_side.size(); j++)
00185                 {
00186                         const Expr_instance *ins(instances_right_side[j]);
00187 
00188                         if((ins->get_symb()->equals(*rule.get_left_symbol())) &&
00189                            (ins->get_num() == 0) &&
00190                            (ins->get_attr()->is_inherit()) &&
00191                            (!ins_attr_computed(ins, ins_computed)))
00192                         /* Non computed in superior context, need leave to computed. */
00193                         {
00194                                 sequence.push_back(LEAVE);
00195                                 leaves = true;
00196                                 break;
00197                         }
00198                         else
00199                         {
00200                                 /* The attr symbols belongs to some right side symbol of the rule. */
00201                                 if((ins->get_attr()->is_synthetize()) &&
00202                                    (!ins_attr_computed(ins, ins_computed_own)))
00203                                 /* Non computed in this context, proceed to compute. */
00204                                 {
00205                                         vector<const Symbol*> non_terminals(rule.get_non_terminals_right_side());
00206 
00207                                         short index_ins(ins->get_num());
00208                                         if(ins->get_symb()->equals(*rule.get_left_symbol()))
00209                                         {
00210                                                 /* It should consider that the left instance has zero index. */
00211                                                 index_ins--;
00212                                         }
00213 
00214                                         /* Generate visits */
00215                                         map<Key_plan_project, unsigned short >::const_iterator it_plan_proj;
00216 
00217                                         for(size_t k(0); k < non_terminals.size(); k++)
00218                                         {
00219                                                 if(non_terminals[k]->equals(*ins->get_symb()))
00220                                                 {
00221                                                         if (index_ins == 0)
00222                                                         {
00223                                                                 /* Get project plan to find the plan with this order sup. */
00224                                                                 Key_plan_project key_p;
00225                                                                 key_p.id_plan_project = it_plan->first;
00226                                                                 key_p.symbol_project = ins->get_symb();
00227                                                                 key_p.index_ocurrence = k;
00228                                                                 it_plan_proj = (b_plans.get_plan_project(key_p));
00229 
00230                                                                 /* Visit this child. */
00231                                                                 sequence.push_back(k + 1);
00232                                                         }
00233                                                         index_ins--;
00234                                                 }
00235                                         }
00236                                         /* Generate the recursion to non computed child. */
00237                                         vector <unsigned short> v_seq_child;
00238                                         for(map < Key_plan, unsigned short >::const_iterator it(b_plans.get_plans().begin()); it != b_plans.get_plans().end(); it++)
00239                                         {
00240                                                 if(!belong_it(it, plans_computed) && !belong_index(it->second, v_seq_computed) && it->second !=it_plan->second)
00241                                                 {
00242                                                         /* Plan to recurse: it */
00243                                                         const Rule &rule_child(attr_grammar.get_rule(b_plans.get_context_unique(it->first.id_plan)[0]));
00244                                                         if ((rule_child.get_left_symbol()->equals(*ins->get_symb())) &&
00245                                                                 (it->first.plan == it_plan_proj->second))
00246                                                         /* The plan to launch the recursion has the need context. */
00247                                                         {
00248                                                                 vector<Expr_instance> ins_computed_child;
00249                                                                 get_inherits_of(ins->get_symb(), ins_computed_own, ins_computed_child);
00250                                                                 vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator > p_computed_child;
00251                                                                 /* Adds as computed the current plan. */
00252                                                                 p_computed_child.push_back(it_plan);
00253                                                                 merge_vec(plans_computed, p_computed_child);
00254 
00255                                                                 gen_visit_seq(it, ins_computed_child, p_computed_child, v_seq_child);
00256 
00257                                                                 /* Removes current plan as computed. */
00258                                                                 merge_vec_without_plan(p_computed_child, plans_computed, it_plan);
00259 
00260                                                                 /* Update information_computed plans. */
00261                                                                 plan_family_computed(plans_computed, v_seq_child);
00262 
00263                                                                 /* Saves all instances calculated for the visit. */
00264                                                                 for(size_t i_rec(0); i_rec < ins_computed_child.size(); i_rec++)
00265                                                                 {
00266                                                                         if(ins_computed_child[i_rec].get_attr()->is_synthetize())
00267                                                                         {
00268                                                                                 ins_computed_child[i_rec].set_num(ins->get_num());
00269                                                                                 ins_computed_own.push_back(ins_computed_child[i_rec]);
00270                                                                         }
00271                                                                 }
00272                                                         }
00273                                                 }
00274                                         }
00275                                 }
00276                         }
00277                         /* Save computed instance. */
00278                         ins_computed_own.push_back(*ins);
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 if (!leaves)
00282                 {
00283                         /* Compute this equation */
00284                         sequence.push_back(eq->get_id()*(-1));
00285 
00286                         /* Mark the instance */
00287                         const Expr_instance *l_v(eq->get_l_value());
00288                         if (l_v->get_attr()->is_synthetize())
00289                         {
00290                                 ins_computed.push_back(*l_v);
00291                         }
00292                         ins_computed_own.push_back(*l_v);
00293                 }
00294                 else
00295                 {
00296                         /* Cuts the generation unstable visit seq . */
00297                         break;
00298                 }
00299     }
00300     if (!belong_index(it_plan->second, v_seq_computed))
00301     {
00302         update_visit_sequence(sequence, it_plan->second);
00303     }
00304 
00305     if(i == plan.size())
00306     /* Saves without conflicted states. */
00307     {
00308         plans_computed.push_back(it_plan);
00309     }
00310     return true;
00311 }
00312 
00317 void Builder_visit_sequences::update_visit_sequence(const Visit_seq &sequence, const size_t i_plan)
00318 {
00319     size_t i(0);
00320     size_t j(0);
00321     /* Compares the two sequences for resolve conflitic sequence. */
00322     while(i < sequence.size() && j < all_visit_seqs[i_plan].size())
00323     {
00324         if(all_visit_seqs[i_plan][j] == sequence[i])
00325         {
00326             i++;
00327             j++;
00328         }
00329         else
00330         {
00331             if(all_visit_seqs[i_plan][j] == 0)
00332             {
00333                 j++;
00334             }
00335         }
00336     }
00337     /* Check sequence leaves and save visit_sequence. */
00338     unsigned short cant_leaves_copy(0);
00339     for(size_t index(i); index < sequence.size(); index++)
00340     {
00341         if(sequence[index] == 0)
00342         {
00343             cant_leaves_copy++;
00344         }
00345         if(cant_leaves_copy > 1)
00346         {
00347             break;
00348         }
00349         all_visit_seqs[i_plan].push_back(sequence[index]);
00350     }
00351     /* Only saves at most one leave */
00352     assert(cant_leaves_copy<2);
00353 }
00354 
00358 bool Builder_visit_sequences::generate_visit_sequences()
00359 {
00360     for(size_t i(0); i < b_plans.get_plans_uniques().size(); i++)
00361     {
00362         Visit_seq v_s;
00363         all_visit_seqs.push_back(v_s);
00364     }
00365 
00366     vector <unsigned short> visit_seq_computed;
00367     vector <map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator> plans_computed_all;
00368     /* For all plans */
00369         for(map < Key_plan, unsigned short >::const_iterator it(b_plans.get_plans().begin()); it != b_plans.get_plans().end(); it++)
00370     {
00371         const Rule &rule(attr_grammar.get_rule(b_plans.get_context_unique(it->first.id_plan)[0]));
00372         if (rule.get_left_symbol()->equals(*attr_grammar.get_initial_symb()))
00373         {
00374                 /* This plan is belong a initial symbol (initial rule). */
00375             if(!belong_index(it->second, visit_seq_computed))
00376             {
00377                 vector<Expr_instance> ins_computed;
00378                 vector< map<Key_plan, unsigned short>::const_iterator > plans_computed;
00379                 merge_vec(plans_computed_all, plans_computed);
00380                                 gen_visit_seq(it, ins_computed, plans_computed, visit_seq_computed);
00381                                 merge_vec(plans_computed, plans_computed_all);
00382                                 plan_family_computed(plans_computed, visit_seq_computed);
00383             }
00384         }
00385     }
00386         cout << "* Build visit sequences ---- [  OK  ]" << endl;
00387     return true;
00388 }
00389 
00393 const vector<Visit_seq> &Builder_visit_sequences::get_visit_seq() const
00394 {
00395     return all_visit_seqs;
00396 }

00401 void Builder_visit_sequences::print_all_visit_sequences() const
00402 {
00403     for(size_t i(0); i < all_visit_seqs.size(); i++)
00404     {
00405         cout << "Visit Sequence Nro " << i+1 << ": ";
00406         for(size_t j(0); j < all_visit_seqs[i].size(); j++)
00407         {
00408             cout << all_visit_seqs[i][j];
00409             if(j < all_visit_seqs[i].size() - 1)
00410             {
00411                 cout << ", ";
00412             }
00413         }
00414         cout << "." << endl;
00415     }
00416 }
